General.Name: AMZE
General.Description: Amaze Holdings, Inc. produces and sells low-carb and low-calorie wines in the United States and Puerto Rico. The company's wine varietals include Cabernet Sauvignon, Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, Rosé, Sauvignon Blanc, Sparkling Rosé, and Reserve Napa Cabernet Sauvignon. It sells its products through wholesale, retail, and direct-to-consumer channels. The company was formerly known as Fresh Vine Wine, Inc. and changed its name to Amaze Holdings, Inc. in March 2025. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Charlotte, North Carolina.
General.Address: PO Box 78984, Charlotte, NC, United States, 28271
